section.title: Property
section.para: The property handler listens on the property attribute just like apache ant, consider the following application.ini example:
section.programlisting:
[production]
property.applicationUrl = APPLICATION_URL property.baseUrl = "#{applicationUrl}MyProject/public" property.imagesUrl = #{baseUrl}/images property.scriptsUrl = #{baseUrl}/scripts property.locale = en
images.thumbsUp = #{imagesUrl}/thumbsUp.png
section.para: Every occurences will get replaced with their proper properties.
